text:
The Laguna Beach baby boom continues! This year, we’ve seen many stars from the hit MTV reality show start or continue growing their families. Lauren Conrad become a first-time mom, Casey Reinhardt is expecting her second baby, and Alex M. has a one-year-old on her hands, while Kristin Cavallari has her hands full with THREE little ones in Nashville, Tennessee. Now, Laguna‘s Talan Torriero and his wife Danielle have joined the new-parent squad, as they welcomed a baby boy over the weekend.

“Bronson Leonardo Torriero,” Torriero captioned his photos of both mom and dad with baby. “Born on Oct. 8th, 2017 at 3:26pm and weighing 7.7 pounds. I fell in love with @danielletorriero all over again today.”

He gave a few additional details to Us Weekly, including the fact that the labor came as a bit of a surprise. “My wife was scheduled to be induced into labor on Wednesday, October 11, but her water broke last night at 2:30am,” he said.

“I can’t tell you how proud I am of my wife,” he continued. “She had a tough pregnancy and I am in awe of how well she handled giving birth to our son.” He didn’t provide any additional details on the difficulties she experienced.

“When I first saw my son cry and take his first breath in the world, I couldn’t help but tear up just thinking about how beautiful life is,” he continued. “I fell even more in love with my wife today. She is going to make an incredible mother and I can’t wait to get our boy home to start this journey.”

Danielle also shared a pic of the couple with new baby Bronson, calling it the “happiest moment of our lives!!!”

The new parents have been married since 2014, and recently celebrated their third anniversary. Congrats to the growing family!

Who do you think the next Laguna Beach alum to have a baby will be? Let us know @BritandCo!

(Photo via Talan Torriero/Instagram)
